段: 雖然咱分開才短短兩三工，寂寞的日子親像過一世人。毋願身邊無你踮茫茫世間，孤孤單單無人來疼痛。

sui-jian5 lan2 hun-khui chiah te2-te2 nng7 sann kong, chek8-bok8 e5 jit8-chi2 chhin-chhiunn7 ke3 chit8-si3-lang5. m7 goan7 sin-pinn bo5 li2 tiam3 bong5-bong5 se3-kan, kou-kou-toann-toann bo5 lang5 lai5 thiann3-thang3.
雖然有時陣阮會目箍紅，攏是因為你放阮孤單一人，為你思思念念我心甘情願，因為你是我最愛的人。
sui-jian5 u7 si5-chun7 gun2 e7 bak8-khou ang5, long2 si7 in-ui7 li2 pang3 goan2 kou-toann chit8 lang5, ui7 li2 su-su-liam7-liam7 goa2 sim-kam-cheng5-goan7, in-ui7 li2 si7 goa2 choe3 ai3 e5 lang5 .
希望你對阮全心全意疼命命，用一生一世來陪阮行。毋管風偌透，毋管雨偌大，只要兩人行相倚，希望你對阮全心全意疼命命，用一生一世來陪阮行。

hi-bong7 li2 tui3 gun2 choan5-sim-choan5-i3 thiann3-mia7-mia7, eng7 it-seng-it-se3 lai5 poe5 gun2 kiann5. m7 koan2 hong loa7 thau3, m7 koan2 hou7 joa7 toa7, chi2-iau3 nng7 lang5 kiann5 sio-oa2, hi-bong7 li2 tui3 gun2 choan5-sim-choan5-i3 thiann3-mia7-mia7, eng7 it-seng-it-se3 lai5 poe5 gun2 kiann5.
愛情的路途甘願受風寒，我永遠愛你無變卦。
ai3-cheng5 e5 lou7-tou5 kam-goan7 siu7 hong-koann5, goa2 eng2-oan2 ai3 li2 bo5 pian3-koa3.
思念的苦酒我閣一杯雄雄來啉落去，希望醉後會當放聲叫你的名字。身邊若無你時間有啥意義，放予伊茫茫渺渺過去，醒來就看見你。思念的苦酒我閣一杯雄雄來啉 落去，希望醉後會當放聲叫你的名字。身邊若無你時間有啥意義，放予伊茫茫渺渺過去，醒來就看見你。

su-liam7 e5 khou2 chiu2 goa2 koh chit8 poe hiong5-hiong5 lai5 lim--loh8-khi3, hi-bong7 chui3-au7 e7 tang3 pang3-siann kio3 li2 e5 mia5-ji7. sin-pinn na7 bo5 li2 si5-kan u7 siann2 i3-gi7, pang3 hou7 i bong5-bong5-biau2-biau2--koe3-khi3, chhinn2--lai5 chiu7 khoann3-kinn3 li2. su-liam7 e5 khou2 chiu2 goa2 koh chit8 poe hiong5-hiong5 lai5 lim--loh8-khi3, hi-bong7 chui3-au7 e7 tang3 pang3-siann kio3 li2 e5 mia5-ji7. sin-pinn na7 bo5 li2 si5-kan u7 siann2 i3-gi7, pang3 hou7 i bong5-bong5-biau2-biau2--koe3-khi3, chhinn2--lai5 chiu7 khoann3-kinn3 li2.
窗外雨水滴滴拍入阮的心，珠淚若雨看未真，應該怎樣對待你才肯相信，我對你的情用偌深。思念的苦酒我閣一杯我甘願醉予死，等待你將阮輕輕拍醒，用一向即疼惜我的唚。

thang-goa7 hou7-chui2 tih-tih phah jip8 goan2 e5 sim, chu-lui7 na7 hou7 khoann3 be7 chin, eng-kai choann2-iunn7 tui3-thai7 li2 chiah kheng2 siong-sin3, goa2 tui3 li2 e5 cheng5 iong7 joa7 chhim. su-liam7 e5 khou2 chiu2 goa2 koh chit8 poe goa2 kam-goan7 chui3 hou7 si2, tan2-thai7 li2 chiong goan2 khin-khin phah-chhinn2, eng7 it-hiong3 chiah thiann3-sioh goa2 e5 chim.
思念的苦酒我閣一杯雄雄來啉落去，希望醉後會當放聲叫你的名字。身邊若無你時間有啥意義，放予伊茫茫渺渺過去，醒來就看見你。思念的苦酒我閣一杯雄雄來啉 落去，希望醉後會當放聲叫你的名字。身邊若無你時間有啥意義，放予伊茫茫渺渺過去，醒來就看見你。

su-liam7 e5 khou2 chiu2 goa2 koh chit8 poe hiong5-hiong5 lai5 lim--loh8-khi3, hi-bong7 chui3-au7 e7 tang3 pang3-siann kio3 li2 e5 mia5-ji7. sin-pinn na7 bo5 li2 si5-kan u7 siann2 i3-gi7, pang3 hou7 i bong5-bong5-biau2-biau2--koe3-khi3, chhinn2--lai5 chiu7 khoann3-kinn3 li2. su-liam7 e5 khou2 chiu2 goa2 koh chit8 poe hiong5-hiong5 lai5 lim--loh8-khi3, hi-bong7 chui3-au7 e7 tang3 pang3-siann kio3 li2 e5 mia5-ji7. sin-pinn na7 bo5 li2 si5-kan u7 siann2 i3-gi7, pang3 hou7 i bong5-bong5-biau2-biau2--koe3-khi3, chhinn2--lai5 chiu7 khoann3-kinn3 li2.

窗外雨水滴滴拍入阮的心，珠淚若雨看未真，應該怎樣對待你才肯相信，我對你的情用偌深。思念的苦酒我閣一杯我甘願醉予死，等待你將阮輕輕拍醒，用一向即疼惜我的唚。

thang-goa7 hou7-chui2 tih-tih phah jip8 goan2 e5 sim, chu-lui7 na7 hou7 khoann3 be7 chin, eng-kai choann2-iunn7 tui3-thai7 li2 chiah kheng2 siong-sin3, goa2 tui3 li2 e5 cheng5 iong7 joa7 chhim. su-liam7 e5 khou2 chiu2 goa2 koh chit8 poe goa2 kam-goan7 chui3 hou7 si2, tan2-thai7 li2 chiong goan2 khin-khin phah-chhinn2, eng7 it-hiong3 chiah thiann3-sioh goa2 e5 chim.
我想無原因，咱的情你怎樣會狠心來反背，放你自由飛，對你我已經讓甲無路通退，若註定還你這段感情債，我付出已經超過，我毋願閣再為你戇戇踅，離開傷心地。

goa2 siunn7 bo5 goan5-in, lan2 e5 cheng5 li2 chainn2-iunn7 e7 hun2-sim lai5 hoan2-poe7, pang3 li2 chu7-iu5 poe, tui3 li2 goa2 i2-keng niu7 kah bo5 lou7 thang thoe3, na7 chu3-tiann7 heng5 li2 chit toann7 kam2-cheng5-che3, goa2 hu3-chhut i2-keng chhiau-koe3, goa2 m7 goan7 koh chai3 ui7 li2 gong7-gong7 seh8, li7-khui siong-sim-toe7.
收回真心愛你到今暗，請你莫閣擾亂阮的夢，還你傷心送你做紀念，寂寞佮孤單予阮一个人承擔，今後做你去愛別人。

siu-hoe5 chin-sim ai3 li2 kau3 kim-am3, chhiann2 li2 mai3 koh jiau2-loan7 goan2 e5 bang7, heng5 li2 siong-sim sang3 li2 choe3 ki3-liam7, chek8-bok8 kah kou-toann hou7 gun2 chit8 e5 lang5 seng5-tam, kim-au7 choe3 li2 khi3 ai3 pat8-lang5.
交予你的心你囥佇佗位，風雨中的感情你敢也會記，無奈秋風赫爾冷，陣陣吹踮胸前，心虛的笑容是你最後的表情。你愛彼个人佇底等你，伊敢有親像我赫爾仔愛你。過去情景像電影，輕輕浮在眼前，每一幕攏予我有講袂出來的心疼。

kau hou7 li2 e5 sim li2 khng3 ti7 to2-ui7, hong-hou7 tiong e5 kam2-cheng5 li2 kiam2 iau2 e7 ki3, bo5-nai7 chhiu-hong hiah-nih leng2, chun7-chun7 chhoe tiam3 heng-cheng5, sim-hi e5 chhio3-iong5 si7 li2 choe3-au7 e5 piau2-cheng5. li2 ai3 hit e5 lang5 ti7 teh tan2 li2, i kam2 u7 chhin-chhiunn7 goa2 hiah-nih-a2 ai3 li2. koe3-khi3 cheng5-keng2 chhiunn7 tian7-iann2, khin-khin phu5 chai7 gan2-cheng5, mui2 chit8 bou7 long2 hou7 goa2 u7 kong2 boe7 chhut--lai5 e5 sim-thiann3.
毋願相信我的真心，最後換來一場絕情，毋願相信你的愛情赫爾仔冷，毋願相信我的真心，最後換來一場絕情，敢講天註定愛你一生，真心換絕情換絕情。

m7 goan7 siong-sin3 goa2 e5 chin-sim, choe3-au7 oann7 lai5 chit8 tiunn5 choat8-cheng5, m7 goan7 siong-sin3 li2 e5 ai3-cheng5 hiah-nih-a2 leng2, m7 goan7 siong-sin3 goa2 e5 chin-sim, choe3-au7 oann7 lai5 chit8 tiunn5 choat8-cheng5, kam2 kong2 thinn-chu3-tiann7 ai3 li2 it-seng, chin-sim oann7 choat8-cheng5 oann7 choat8-cheng5.
你愛彼个人佇底等你，伊敢有親像我赫爾仔愛你。過去情景像電影，輕輕浮在眼前，每一幕攏予我有講袂出來的心疼。

li2 ai3 hit e5 lang5 ti7 teh tan2 li2, i kam2 u7 chhin-chhiunn7 goa2 hiah-nih-a2 ai3 li2. koe3-khi3 cheng5-keng2 chhiunn7 tian7-iann2, khin-khin phu5 chai7 gan2-cheng5, mui2 chit8 bou7 long2 hou7 goa2 u7 kong2 boe7 chhut--lai5 e5 sim-thiann3.
毋願相信我的真心，最後換來一場絕情，毋願相信你的愛情赫爾仔冷，毋願相信我的真心，最後換來一場絕情，敢講天註定愛你一生，真心換絕情換絕情。

m7 goan7 siong-sin3 goa2 e5 chin-sim, choe3-au7 oann7 lai5 chit8 tiunn5 choat8-cheng5, m7 goan7 siong-sin3 li2 e5 ai3-cheng5 hiah-nih-a2 leng2, m7 goan7 siong-sin3 goa2 e5 chin-sim, choe3-au7 oann7 lai5 chit8 tiunn5 choat8-cheng5, kam2 kong2 thinn-chu3-tiann7 ai3 li2 it-seng, chin-sim oann7 choat8-cheng5 oann7 choat8-cheng5.
毋願相信我的真心，最後換來一場絕情，毋願相信你的愛情赫爾仔冷，毋願相信我的真心，最後換來一場絕情，敢講天註定愛你一生，真心換絕情換絕情。

m7 goan7 siong-sin3 goa2 e5 chin-sim, choe3-au7 oann7 lai5 chit8 tiunn5 choat8-cheng5, m7 goan7 siong-sin3 li2 e5 ai3-cheng5 hiah-nih-a2 leng2, m7 goan7 siong-sin3 goa2 e5 chin-sim, choe3-au7 oann7 lai5 chit8 tiunn5 choat8-cheng5, kam2 kong2 thinn-chu3-tiann7 ai3 li2 it-seng, chin-sim oann7 choat8-cheng5 oann7 choat8-cheng5.
踮佇阮的面前，你已經毋是你，目屎坱著阮的愛，癡情無人知。刻佇心內的名字，就欲消失阮身邊，你敢知這需要勇氣，啊！你將阮囥佇那裡，雄雄叫阮的感情無春天。

tiam3 ti7 gun2 e5 bin7-cheng5, li2 i2-keng m7 si7 li2, bak8-sai2 eng tioh8 gun2 e5 ai3, chhi-cheng5 bo5 lang5 chai. khek ti7 sim-lai7 e5 mia5-ji7, chiu7 beh siau-sit gun2 sin-pinn, li2 kam2 chai che su-iau3 iong2-khi3, ah! li2 chiong gun2 khng3 ti7 na2-li2, hiong5-hiong5 kio3 gun2 e5 kam2-cheng5 bo5 chhun-thinn.
請你講出一句你心內上真心的話，這句話是阮毋捌聽過的溫柔。請你講出一句你心內上真心的話，你敢有為阮心疼過。

chhiann2 li2 kong2 chhut chit8 ku3 li2 sim-lai7 siong7 chin-sim e5 oe7, chit ku3 oe7 si7 gun2 m7 bat thiann--koe3 e5 un-jiu5. chhiann2 li2 kong2 chhut chit8 ku3 li2 sim-lai7 siong7 chin-sim e5 oe7, li2 kam2 u7 ui7 goan2 sim-thiann3 ke3.
我有聽著風聲，你的身邊不只我一个，害我的心肝怵一下，敢有這款的問題，我著驚走去看詳細。句句事實毋是假，在我的腦海裡烏天暗地，心內是真後悔，真情來予人出賣。

goa2 u7 thiann tioh8 hong-siann, li2 e5 sin-pinn put-chi2 goa2 chit8 e5, hai7 goa2 e5 sim-koann thut chit8 e7, kam2 u7 chit khoan2 e5 bun7-te5, goa2 tioh8-kiann chau2 khi3 khoann3 siong5-soe3. ku3-ku3 su7-sit8 m7 si7 ke2, chai7 goa2 e5 nau2-hai2--nih8 ou-thinn-am3-toe7, sim-lai7 si7 chin hio7-hoe2, chin-cheng5 lai5 hou7 lang5 chhut-be7.
我有聽著風聲，你的身邊不只我一个，害我的心肝怵一下，敢有這款的問題，我著驚走去看詳細。句句事實毋是假，在我的腦海裡烏天暗地，心內是真後悔，真情來予人出賣。

goa2 u7 thiann tioh8 hong-siann, li2 e5 sin-pinn put-chi2 goa2 chit8 e5, hai7 goa2 e5 sim-koann thut chit8 e7, kam2 u7 chit khoan2 e5 bun7-te5, goa2 tioh8-kiann chau2 khi3 khoann3 siong5-soe3. ku3-ku3 su7-sit8 m7 si7 ke2, chai7 goa2 e5 nau2-hai2--nih8 ou-thinn-am3-toe7, sim-lai7 si7 chin hio7-hoe2, chin-cheng5 lai5 hou7 lang5 chhut-be7.
我著驚走去看詳細。句句事實毋是假，在我的腦海裡烏天暗地，心內是真後悔，真情來予人出賣。
goa2 tioh8-kiann chau2 khi3 khoann3 siong5-soe3. ku3-ku3 su7-sit8 m7 si7 ke2, chai7 goa2 e5 nau2-hai2--nih8 ou-thinn-am3-toe7, sim-lai7 si7 chin hio7-hoe2, chin-cheng5 lai5 hou7 lang5 chhut-be7.
敢講攏是天安排，予阮對你有期待。你的真心真情真愛，予阮愛甲即厲害，阮的心事無人知，茫茫渺渺袂當排解，你心內敢猶原對阮底等待。

kam2 kong2 long2 si7 thinn an-pai5, hou7 gun2 tui3 li2 u7 ki5-thai7. li2 e5 chin-sim chin-cheng5 chin ai3, hou7 gun2 ai3 kah chiah li7-hai7, goan2 e5 sim-su7 bo5 lang5 chai, bong5-bong5-biau2-biau2 boe7 tang3 pai5-kai2, li2 sim-lai7 kam2 iu5-goan5 tui3 gun2 teh tan2-thai7.
思思念念像大海，起起落落像風颱。阮的心情無依無倚，期待著你的關懷。想起有你的所在，毋管路途按怎阻礙，阮的心內永遠有堅心的期待。

su-su-liam7-liam7 chhiunn7 toa7-hai2, khi2-khi2-loh8-loh8 chhiunn7 hong-thai. goan2 e5 sim-cheng5 bo5 i bo5 oa2, ki5-thai7 tioh8 li2 e5 koan-hoai5. siunn7-khi2 u7 li2 e5 sou2-chai7, m7 koan2 lou7-tou5 an2-choann2 chou2-gai7, goan2 e5 sim-lai7 eng2-oan2 u7 kian-sim e5 ki5-thai7.
這个真情的世界，只有你是阮的心愛。想起有你踮佇阮的身邊，毋驚風雨一直來。這个真情的世界，因為有你才有光彩，我會為你忍耐，等待好將來。

chit e5 chin-cheng5 e5 se3-kai3, chi2-u7 li2 si7 goan2 e5 sim-ai3. siunn7-khi2 u7 li2 tiam3 ti7 gun2 e5 sin-pinn, m7 kiann hong-hou7 it-tit8 lai5. chit e5 chin-cheng5 e5 se3-kai3, in-ui7 u7 li2 chiah u7 kong-chhai2, goa2 e7 ui7 li2 jim2-nai7, tan2-thai7 ho2 chiong-lai5.
月娘會圓為著你一个，鐵樹也是為你才開花，我是溫柔體貼閣聽話，像我這種世間那佗尋。心肝我也予你挖去賣，可惜你猶毋知通反悔，偏偏講我對你攏是假，而且笑我無啥貨啊！真情枉費可比水流溪。

goeh8-niu5 e7 inn5 ui7 tioh8 li2 chit8 e5, thih-chhiu7 ia7 si7 ui7 li2 chiah khui-hoe, goa2 si7 un-jiu5 the2-thiap koh thiann-oe7, chhiunn7 goa2 chit chiong2 se3-kan na2-to2 chhoe7. sim-koann goa2 ia7 hou7 li2 ou2 khi3 boe7, kho2-sioh li2 iau2 m7 chai thang hoan2-hoe2, phian-phian kong2 goa2 tui3 li2 long2 si7 ke2, ji5-chhiann2 chhio3 goa2 bo5 siann2-hoe3 ah! chin-cheng5 ong2-hui3 kho2-pi2 chui2-liu5 khe.
月娘會圓為著你一个，鐵樹也是為你才開花，我是溫柔體貼閣聽話，像我這種世間那佗尋。心肝我也予你挖去賣，可惜你猶毋知通反悔，偏偏講我對你攏是假，而且笑我無啥貨啊！真情枉費可比水流溪。

goeh8-niu5 e7 inn5 ui7 tioh8 li2 chit8 e5, thih-chhiu7 ia7 si7 ui7 li2 chiah khui-hoe, goa2 si7 un-jiu5 the2-thiap koh thiann-oe7, chhiunn7 goa2 chit chiong2 se3-kan na2-to2 chhoe7. sim-koann goa2 ia7 hou7 li2 ou2 khi3 boe7, kho2-sioh li2 iau2 m7 chai thang hoan2-hoe2, phian-phian kong2 goa2 tui3 li2 long2 si7 ke2, ji5-chhiann2 chhio3 goa2 bo5 siann2-hoe3 ah! chin-cheng5 ong2-hui3 kho2-pi2 chui2-liu5 khe.
心肝我也予你挖去賣，可惜你猶毋知通反悔，偏偏講我對你攏是假，而且笑我無啥貨啊！真情枉費可比水流溪。

sim-koann goa2 ia7 hou7 li2 ou2 khi3 boe7, kho2-sioh li2 iau2 m7 chai thang hoan2-hoe2, phian-phian kong2 goa2 tui3 li2 long2 si7 ke2, ji5-chhiann2 chhio3 goa2 bo5 siann2-hoe3 ah! chin-cheng5 ong2-hui3 kho2-pi2 chui2-liu5 khe.
思念心愛的彼个人，暝日無心情，情緒亂，若想著過去的彼段甜蜜戀夢，加添我滿腹哀怨。不知不覺目箍紅，為怎樣一切希望，會來全部變成空。

su-liam7 sim-ai3 e5 hit e5 lang5, me5-jit8 bo5 sim-chiann5, cheng5-su7 loan7, na7 siunn7 tioh8 koe3-khi3 e5 hit toann7 tinn-bit8 loan5-bang7, ke-thinn goa2 moa2-pak ai-oan3. put-ti-put-kak bak8-khou ang5, ui7 chainn2-iunn7 it-chhe3 hi-bong7, e7 lai5 choan5-pou7 pian3-seng5 khang.
思念心愛的彼个人，暝日無心情，情緒亂，若想著過去的彼段甜蜜戀夢，加添我滿腹哀怨。不知不覺目箍紅，為怎樣一切希望，會來全部變成空。

su-liam7 sim-ai3 e5 hit e5 lang5, me5-jit8 bo5 sim-chiann5, cheng5-su7 loan7, na7 siunn7 tioh8 koe3-khi3 e5 hit toann7 tinn-bit8 loan5-bang7, ke-thinn goa2 moa2-pak ai-oan3. put-ti-put-kak bak8-khou ang5, ui7 chainn2-iunn7 it-chhe3 hi-bong7, e7 lai5 choan5-pou7 pian3-seng5 khang.
思念心愛的彼个人，暝日無心情，情緒亂，若想著過去的彼段甜蜜戀夢，加添我滿腹哀怨。不知不覺目箍紅，為怎樣一切希望，會來全部變成空。

su-liam7 sim-ai3 e5 hit e5 lang5, me5-jit8 bo5 sim-chiann5, cheng5-su7 loan7, na7 siunn7 tioh8 koe3-khi3 e5 hit toann7 tinn-bit8 loan5-bang7, ke-thinn goa2 moa2-pak ai-oan3. put-ti-put-kak bak8-khou ang5, ui7 chainn2-iunn7 it-chhe3 hi-bong7, e7 lai5 choan5-pou7 pian3-seng5 khang.
講啥物只愛我一个，根本就是白賊話。講啥物永遠欲做伙，根本就是無坦白。彼一擺你啉甲馬西馬西，落勾來講出著心內話。原來你愛的是另外彼一个，另外彼一个。

kong2 siann2-mih8 chi2 ai3 goa2 chit8 e5, kin-pun2 chiu7-si7 peh8-chhat8-oe7. kong2 siann2-mih8 eng2-oan2 beh cho3-hoe2, kin-pun2 chiu7-si7 bo5 than2-pek8. hit chit8 pai2 li2 lim kah ma2-se ma2-se, lau3-kau lai5 kong2 chhut tioh8 sim-lai7-oe7. goan5-lai5 li2 ai3 e5 si7 leng7-goa7 hit chit8 e5, leng7-goa7 hit chit8 e5.
山盟海誓一切攏嘛假，阮的真情煞予你來當菜尾，從今以後決心佮你扯，決心佮你扯。
san-beng5-hai2-se3 it-chhe3 long2 ma7 ke2, goan2 e5 chin-cheng5 soah hou7 li2 lai5 tong3 chhai3-boe2, chiong5-kim-i2-au7 koat-sim kah li2 chhe2, koat-sim kah li2 chhe2.
